[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "



BIRTHS AND DEATHS REGISTRATION ACT, 1968

CERTIFICATE OF BIRTH

(Regulation 9)


"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

1. Certficate Number                             {{ doc.name }}


2. Date of Birth                               {{ doc.date_of_birth }}


3. Place of Birth                                {{ doc.application_number }}


4. Name(s)                                   {{ doc.names_given }} {{ doc.surname }}


5. Gender                                   {{ doc.gender }}


6. Father's Name(s) and Surname                       {{ doc.fathers_full_name }}


6. Mother's Name(s) and Surname                         {{ doc.mothers_full_name }}


8. Date of Registration                             {{ doc.posting_date }}



"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "_custom_html", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Custom HTML", "fieldtype": "HTML", "options": "

Dated {{ doc.posting_date }}
